$interpreted: Jahan: Wait, Sir Dylan! P-Please reconsider~
Jahan: It's way, way too risky to assign a rookie to protect the princess!
Dylan: Dylan here to greet his Majesty.
Theodore: Dylan, what is all this commotion about?
Dylan: His Majesty, regarding the long-vacant position of the Princess's bodyguard,
Dylan: I have chosen a candidate.
Theodore: Oh, who is it?
Sione: Sione here to greet His Majesty.
Theodore: Wait a moment, isn't this girl...
Theodore: Isn't she from the Aldric family? The Royal Infantry rookie who disobeyed my orders and refused to kill a beast?
Theodore: Dylan, have you gone insane!?
Theodore: How can you entrust the Princess' life to a little girl who hasn't even the courage to kill a beast?
Dylan: Your Majesty, this is my decision as commander of the Royal Infantry.
Theodore: Well I override it! This is about Angelia's safety, and I will not agree to it!
Theodore: Unless she can prove her abilities right here and now!
Dylan: Understood. Jahan, this is a job for you.
Sione: Sir Augustinus, apologies in advance!
Jahan: Eh? What do I have to do with any of this crap?
Dylan: Sione, this is a test. Don't hold back, give it everything you've got.
Sione: Yes, sir!
Jahan: Whaaaaa, time out, time out! I think we should ask his Majesty Theodore if this test is necessary...
Theodore: Jahan, make Colonel Levon realize that his decision is a mistake!
Jahan: His Majesty!? Aren't you on my side?
Jahan: Hmph, I... I held back, since you're part of the Aldric family and everything...
Jahan: You're still just a weak kid... But this time I'll give you a pass.
Jahan: ...*wince*... ow... ouch...
Sione: It is true, I have much room for improvement. I appreciate Sir Augustinus' efforts to go easy on me.
Dylan: His Majesty Theodore, what do you think?
Theodore: ...Hmph, I have other important issues to tend to. You may take your leave.
Dylan: His Majesty has acknowledged you.
Dylan: Come, I'll take you to meet Princess Angelia. She's probably waiting.
Sione: Yes, sir!

Model.Text: Wait, Sir Dylan! P-Please reconsider~
It's way, way too risky to assign a rookie to protect the princess!
Dylan here to greet his Majesty.
Dylan, what is all this commotion about?
His Majesty, regarding the long-vacant position of the Princess's bodyguard,
I have chosen a candidate.
Oh, who is it?
Sione here to greet His Majesty.

Isn't she from the Aldric family? The Royal Infantry rookie who disobeyed my orders and refused to kill a beast?
Dylan, have you gone insane!?
How can you entrust the Princess' life to a little girl who hasn't even the courage to kill a beast?
Your Majesty, this is my decision as commander of the Royal Infantry.
Well I override it! This is about Angelia's safety, and I will not agree to it!
Unless she can prove her abilities right here and now!
Understood. Jahan, this is a job for you.
Sir Augustinus, apologies in advance!
Eh? What do I have to do with any of this crap?
Sione, this is a test. Don't hold back, give it everything you've got.
Yes, sir!
Whaaaaa, time out, time out! I think we should ask his Majesty Theodore if this test is necessary...
Jahan, make Colonel Levon realize that his decision is a mistake!
His Majesty!? Aren't you on my side?
Hmph, I... I held back, since you're part of the Aldric family and everything...
You're still just a weak kid... But this time I'll give you a pass.
...*wince*... ow... ouch...
It is true, I have much room for improvement. I appreciate Sir Augustinus' efforts to go easy on me.
His Majesty Theodore, what do you think?
...Hmph, I have other important issues to tend to. You may take your leave.
His Majesty has acknowledged you.
Come, I'll take you to meet Princess Angelia. She's probably waiting.
Yes, sir!
